steps.title: Draw a roundish almond shape
steps.content: Draw a roundish almond shape , which will be the eye .

steps.title: Draw a large circle in the eye
steps.content: Draw a large circle in the eye , which will be the iris.

steps.title: Draw a smaller, black-filled circle in the middle.
steps.content: Draw a smaller, black-filled circle in the middle. This will be the pupil.

steps.title: Draw a very thin or dashed line circle
steps.content: Draw a very thin or dashed line circle between the circles for the pupil and the iris. This will be the line that the tomoe will rest on.

steps.title: Draw the tomoe
steps.content: Draw the tomoe - which little circles with a small curved tail. Make sure they are smaller than the pupil, and evenly space them on the middle circle. The number of tomoe in the Sharingan indicates how powerful it is, with the most powerful having three tomoe.

steps.title: Add shading and value
steps.content: Add shading and value to the eye and iris to give it a realistic look. Ink all of the lines you wish to keep, and erase those you do not.

steps.title: Color it if you wish
steps.content: Color it if you wish . Color the iris red and the pupil and tomoe black. The thin middle circle that the tomoe are on should be dark red.
